page.title: 15LITTLE CLACTON FUN RUN
page.content: Little Clacton Fun Run took place on Sunday 19th May. The weather was fine and sunny & there was a choice of a 13 or a six & a half mile course. There were 45 runners for the 13 mile course of which 12-14 were juniors & for the shorter course there were 115. Among these were 40 children from a local junior school with their teacher. On the longer course all but three people finished & for the other they all completed it. Most of the people who ran were sponsored for different charities. A shield was being awarded for the best sponge station & we won it. We were dressed up as 'All sports for all sorts' because the boys were dressed as girls & the girls as boys. I was a rugby player, but I was glad I was helping & not actually running.
